@description.name: @description
@description.body: A Tooltip provides additional information for widgets when the user hovers over a widget.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: atom {qx.ui.basic.Atom} atom widget which represents the content of the tooltip
@childControl.description: atom widget which represents the content of the tooltip

@param.name: @param
@param.body: icon {String?null} Icon URL of the tooltip

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Interval after the tooltip is shown (in milliseconds)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Interval after the tooltip is hidden (in milliseconds)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The label/caption/text of the ToolTip's atom.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Any URI String supported by qx.ui.basic.Image to display an icon in ToolTips's atom.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Switches between rich HTML and text content. The text mode (false) supports advanced features like ellipsis when the available space is not enough. HTML mode (true) supports multi-line content and all the markup features of HTML content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Widget that opened the tooltip

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Position of the arrow pointing towards the opening widget *

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
id {String} ID of the child control. If a # is used, the id is
   the part in front of the #.
@param.description:
ID of the child control. If a # is used, the id is
   the part in front of the #.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
hash {String?undefined} If a child control name contains a #,
   all text following the # will be the hash argument.
@param.description:
If a child control name contains a #,
   all text following the # will be the hash argument.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #opener}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property arrowPosition. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #arrowPosition}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property arrowPosition. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #arrowPosition}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property arrowPosition. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #arrowPosition}.
